name: Letter from Roelsius, Tobias to Clusius, Carolus, 1597-05

metadata.value: Edition in: C. Clusius, ‘Clarissimo Viro Carolo Clusio, Tobias Roelsius, Reip, Medioburgensis Medicus’, in: Rariorum Plantarum Historia (Leiden 1601) cccxv-cccxx.
Dutch translation by F.W.T. Hunger in University Library Leiden
